text: Rangga Muslim Perkasa (born 3 May 1994), is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 1 club Bhayangkara. ==Career== ===Bhayangkara=== He was signed for Bhayangkara to played in Liga 1 on 2020 season. == Honours == ===Club=== PSS Sleman * Liga 2: 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Rangga Muslim at Soccerway * Rangga Muslim at Liga Indonesia Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:PSS Sleman players Category:Persebaya Surabaya players Category:PSIM Yogyakarta players
title: Rangga Muslim
